MEQA.MY

Welcome

MEQA.MY - Be BASIC but BOLD!

MEQA.MY was born in 2022 with a big vision: to redefine modest fashion by combining comfort and confidence. Founded by Saidatul Hanum binti Sazali, what started small quickly blossomed into a brand known for its stylish tops, bottoms, dresses, hijabs, and kaftans, especially during Eid. With rapid growth and a loyal following, MEQA.MY has become a rising name in local Muslimah fashion, offering pieces that let you be basic yet bold, showcasing your personal style with every wear.
